util.runtime

Class BaseProgramArgument<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.runtime.BaseProgramArgument<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandBuilder, ProgramArgument<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassPathJvmArg, JarJvmArg, ListProgramArgument, SysPropJvmArg

    public class BaseProgramArgument<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgramArgument<T>
    Base class to enforce the set/build protocol required by the ProgramArgument interface.

      • tokens

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> tokens()
        Description copied from interface: CommandBuilder
        Builds the sequence of tokens that make up the string representation of this command, e.g. (pseudo code) [java, -cp, my.jar:ur.jar, app.Main].

      • tokenize

        protected java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> tokenize(T arg)
        Override this method to convert the argument into token components if the default of calling the argument's toString method is not suitable.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to convert to tokens.
        Returns:
        the tokenized representation of the argument as required by the tokens method.
